name: Cyber Snow Alpha Demo
description:
Little concept / demo / WIP of a cyberpunky RPG game made during 

the cyber punk jam 2014 (#cyberpunkjam) by Stalek from Evil Indie Games.

Controls:
WASD, mouse, enter - action, arrows in menu

Fullscreen mode (works better):
Press ESC to see the mouse pointer, then click right mouse button on game and choose "Go fullscreen" mode.


We will be working with this demo/concept to make it fully playable RPG game for PC, MAC and mobile devices:)

Music and Sfx created with beepbox by Evil Indie Games Stalek.
